name: Constellations (Inateno)
description:
Link balls with the given pattern and go explore the galaxy as far as you can, the constellations will be bigger and bigger!

Swippe with finger or mouse, it work as well on mobile / tablets and desktop browsers.

Comments

Please, feel free to comment or to rate (if you've participated in the LudumDare) the game by clicking here (it is not the first entry I made, this is the post-compo, improved version).

I'm on Twitter to, get in touch for anything :)

Other platforms

The Game is available on Windows Store, Windows Phone 8.1 Store and is coming up for Android, iOS.

Updates

I plan to make few update with some new gameplay or power ups, I love improve my games along the time, if you have any idea tell me ;)

Have fun!
